x:scenario.x:label: When converting an anchor element with an xml:id and roles

x:test.x:label: it should return a single a element
it should return the xml:id in the id
it should return the roles as classes
it should not return any other attributes
it should be empty

x:test.x:label: it should return a strong element

it should not return any other attributes
it should return the correct text
